OFFICIAL BMC MERCH: http://bit.ly/BMCmerch

#BlackMagicCraft #Episode168 #MACE2019

This year I headed to MACE in North Carolina and had an amazing experience. This was my first International/USA gaming convention and I'm so thankful to have attended. It was great meeting so many of of best friends, for the first time ever. 

PEOPLE MENTIONED (Check out their work!)
